https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zMC0kbfcBSxVOAsFXxw9Pg1NBJ8.jpg Boothnath vows to redeem himself when spirits tease him, and searches for a child to terrify. He befriends Akhrot, a slum kid, and helps him take on the country's most powerful politician. Bhoothnath Returns
